classes.name: Rogue
classes.info: A rogue is a versatile assassin, capable of sneaky combat and nimble tricks. The rogue is stealthy and dexterous, and can often sneak by foes undetected.

classes.name: Bard
classes.info: A bard is traditionally defined as a poet, especially one who writes impassioned, lyrical, or epic verse. They are highly charismatic individuals, who rely on their charm to deal with foes.

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.info: A sorcerer is a master of arcane magic. Their strength comes from years of study in the arcane arts. Casting spells and dealing damage is their specialty.

classes.name: Barbarian
classes.info: Barbarians are  big, brutal and strong warriors. Their combat style is centered around raging and hitting things. But they often fail when it comes to charisma or stealth

classes.name: Paladin
classes.info: The paladin is a holy knight, crusading in the name of good and order, and is a divine spellcaster. They are mighty warriors who slay foes in the name of their divine god.

classes.name: Druid
classes.info: Druids wield nature-themed magic. Druids have a unique ability that allows them to change into various animal forms, and various other qualities that assist them in natural settings.

classes.name: Commoner
classes.info: This is just some guy named Dave... don't pick this one.
